title: 01/27/22 DPS Hour 1 Tom Pelissero
itunes:title: 01/27/22 DPS Hour 1 Tom Pelissero
description:
Tom Pelissero talks to Dan about the Broncos new head coach hire. Tom says that hiring Nathanial Hackett does not guarantee getting Aaron Rodgers.
